text:
Jeg er en kreativ Software Engineering studerende på 6. semester, der brænder for at løse programmeringsudfordringer, fortrinsvis som backend udvikler.  

Jeg værdsætter teamwork, er god til at bevare overblik, og tager ejerskab for mine opgaver. Min grundige tilgang har givet mig gode resultater på studiet. 

 Min evne til at skabe fremdrift kommer fra min tidligere karriere som selvstændig prisvindende musiker med international turnévirksomhed, som udover kreative processer også har givet mig gode samarbejdsevner og en stærk forretningsforståelse.
textuk:
I'm a creative and hard-working Software Engineering student, just about to finish my bachelor's degree at the University of Southern Denmark in Odense with good results so far. 

I thrive on solving programming challanges preferably working together with nice colleagues, and I'm good at being on top of things, getting things done and taking ownerships of projects. 

I used to be a professional freelance musician, so I've got solid business understanding and am good at collaborating with all kinds of people. 

When not in front of the computer, I enjoy playing music and sailing in the archipelgo of southern Funen together with my family.
